kplr.co
Crowdsourced Kepler API documentation

The Kepler MAST API documentation sucks. Let’s fix that here. Here’s the most useful link.

Getting started

The root URL for the Kepler MAST API is:

http://archive.stsci.edu/kepler/{0}/search.php

where {0} is chosen from one of the table names. For example, to get a list of all the KOIs, you would do something like:

http://archive.stsci.edu/kepler/koi/search.php?action=Search&outputformat=JSON

To filter by a specific Kepler ID, you would append &kepid=8559644 to the above URL.
